message.name: ERR_VALIDATEADHOCBONUS_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: An Ad Hoc Bonus of this type already exists for the period %1d to %2d.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEADHOCBONUS_FV_BONUSTYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: A Bonus Type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEADHOCBONUS_XRV_LIABILITY_PRODUCT
message.locale: Ad Hoc Bonus Criteria cannot be associated with liability products.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEADHOCBONUS_BONUSTYPE_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The Bonus Amount cannot be a negative amount.
